cards.name: Ozempic Savings Card
cards.note: Pay as little as $25/month with commercial insurance. Maximum savings $100/month. Visit ozempic.com for current terms.

cards.name: Wegovy Savings Card
cards.note: Pay as little as $25/month with commercial insurance. Maximum savings $100/month. Visit wegovy.com for current terms.

cards.name: Mounjaro Savings Card
cards.note: Visit mounjaro.com and look for "Savings" or "Patient Support" section. Eligibility and cap; check manufacturer site for current terms.

cards.name: Zepbound Savings Card
cards.note: Visit zepbound.com and look for "Savings" or "Patient Support" section. Eligibility and cap; check manufacturer site for current terms.

cards.name: Rybelsus Savings
cards.note: Visit rybelsus.com and look for "Savings" or "Patient Support" section. Check manufacturer site for current offer.

cards.name: Pharmacy Discount Programs
cards.note: May lower cash price; compare at your pharmacy. Not eligible for HSA/FSA reimbursement.
